content.detailedDescription: On july 4th 2011 my son and i were walking my dog at 10:00 at night.  my son asked me "what is that "?  i said i don't know but it is coming right at us. we both witnessed a sparkling sphere traveling from the north going due south. i can best describe the sphere as omitting multi colors as would a sparkler used by small children on the 4th.  we watched the sphere stop and shoot straight up to the heavens. the speed resembled the reverse of a shooting star. i'm not an expert on aviation, but i am a retired engineer. i do understand g-force.  no living thing of this earth could withstand that type of force. my son was really upset at what he had seen. i was lucky enough to see a saucer type ufo in the sixties.  i was aware of the existence.
content.summary: Watched a shere traveling horizonal towards my son and me then shoot straight up until out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
4 of us were in a 21ft mako- center console fishing boat.  we were just next to one of the lhd battleships, fishing towards the shore and had decided to turn in and go home.  as we started back south towards the boat launch i was sitting towards the bow in front of the console on the starboard side and just happened to look up to the wsw.  i saw this object that was over the southern most tip of the shipyard before the bridge that heads to the home port island.  it just sat there hovering. it was hard to tell the distance, and it all happened so fast.  this metallic object that i can only describe as large and oval shaped that reflected light.  it looked as if it began to turn in place. yet as it did, it grew smaller.  within a matter of seconds it was gone.  it had not "flown away", just vanished.  it was as if it turned in on itself.  it happened so fast i could not even point it out.  i tried to explain what i saw to my friends, but you can guess how that went.  i questioned myself about it for some time.  little did i know that in less than 1 year i would see the exact same thing again.  

for a long time i was mad at myself for not pointing it out immediately, but i tried to immediately rationalize the object.  by the time i had my suspicions it was too late.
content.summary: Reflective metallic oval shape that hovered in place before turning in on itself as it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I did not witness this, i received the link from a friend of the witness which lives in mesquita, vila emil, rio de janeiro, and wishes to remain annonimous for now. he is afraid for his family and his own security. it has been published in youtube, and that is where i took this video from. i wish you at mufon to see if this video, made with a security camera wth infrared capabilities, has any credibility or if it was not faked. in case you at mufon find this video as being trustfull i am prepared to try and sort more accurate information on the witness so that an original record can be obtained. most intriguing in this video is the cat which crosses the street.
content.summary: This was recorded with infrared security cam, nothing could be observed in naked eye or was recorded by security cams without infrared capabilities.
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my car in the parking lot between hampton avenue and main street in sumter, sc when i looked up to the north and saw two dark objects, one larger one smaller, moving in unison. the larger object was somewhat triangular. they moved very slowly in the same direction for about two minutes before fading into light cloud cover. i first noticed it because it was moving so slowly. i found that odd and continued to look assuming it was just a plane. when i realized it was two objects then i really got curious. i thought perhaps it was a glider, but that wouldn't make since for the area, and also wouldn't explain the second smaller object in front of the larger one. i managed to record just under a minute of video, but it was very hard to see it recorded. i lost sight of the objects when they faded into the light clouds in the distance.
content.summary: There were two dark objects, one larger one smaller, moving in unison. the larger object was somewhat triangular

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my boyfriend to park my car in a garages rented. i noticed a strange light in the sky and first thought it was a helicopter since we live by la guardia airport but as we were walking back to my apartment it seemed to be following us. it was around 11 pm on a sunday night the end of june 1976. as we were standing looking up at this ufo it seemed to come closer like it was watching us and then shot off and disappeared without a sound. everything was so quiet. then a friend walked by and he stood there with us watching the ufo. i started to get scared it came so close and i saw windows around the ship. i was scared that we were going to be abducted and said i wanted to go into my apartment. it definitely was watching us. we left and i called the 114 precinct and did not get an answer. i called the daily news and they said they received reports from staten island and brooklyn and nj and it was a broadway light. i said a broadway light does not have windows. they hung up and that was the end of my reporting it. i have spoken about it over the years. and since i am getting older i know what i saw and what i experienced.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Following felt watching me them hovering overhead taking off so fast no sound and returning. very close and large.

content.detailedDescription: It all sterted at my baseball game my team was in the dugout it was about 8:30 then one of my team mates sees a light in the sky. some said it was a star but it was no star. it moved from the southeast to the northeast. it moved slowed but not to slow. then it disapered when it was over us. the some said it might be a weather ballon.
content.summary: It was a baseball game and a light came out of no were it come from the southeast and went to the northeast

content.detailedDescription: I had some contact with ufo's in 2968 in arizona and in 1969 in india...
content.summary: Event 1/// march 28, 1968 - ship telepath message - earth has nothing to fear from space....

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out to my patio at 11:02 pm eastern time. it's completely dark with no street lights within 700 + yards. it is a completely clear and calm night and the stars are bright and easy to see. 

i live directly beneath jetway j8 or j6 at (30*07'26.27" n) (82*38'18.90"w)
and noticed 5 airliners in rout heading south west away from my back door like always approximately 35,000 feet give or take 5,000? so i know at least 1 or 2 of these airliners should have seen this also. 

as i'm standing out back looking southwest watching the airliners fly over and i noticed to my left a really bright star only that star is moving then i noticed it somewhat began to dim to a dark blue then got bright as a landing light then dimmed to the color of a normal star then dark blue again where i all most lost it and repeated this sequence 4 more time. 

as all this is happening i'm trying to put together what am i seeing? first i thought it was a plane then satellite and maybe it's the sun hitting it under the horizon and then it got to my 2 o'clock and just instantaneously stopped and blended in with the surrounding stars!!! 

i didn't take my eyes away from it for over 30 seconds and it was just sitting still then i started to question if i was still looking at the same thing doubting i really just saw what i saw so i started to scan the sky again to try and regain sight of it. then another light that looked like a landing light caught my eye at my 11 o'clock taking the exact same path only faster it seemed. 

now this is where it gets scary. when the second one gets to the point where i lost the first one that blended into the stars the one i lost brightened back up and instantly matched the second ones speed and directly fell in behind the second one and following it out of sight and seemed to change directions to the north east?

the colors i noticed were star white. dark blue and bright halogen bulb yellow like a landing light or reflection from the sun off something metallic. they were the exact size of a normal star just looking up at night.

this all happened in under two minutes and guessing if it had been continuous it would have crossed the horizon well under a minute. the airliners take 3 or 4 minutes from the time i can see them directly overhead. i could hear the airliners overhead but not the lights i were seeing. they had to be well over 70,000 feet if they were even in the atmosphere at all?

i've had a pilots license 20 years this november so i have a little knowledge of what i'm seeing when i look up and i've never seen anything like what i saw last night so if anyone could please explained to me what i might have seen please feel free to contact me i'd love to hear your theory's.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying stars

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were outside in my front yard, i live in a very rural part of the country, so im always looking at the stars, you can see everything..We were looking at the big dipper and i was explaining to her that you use it to locate sirius and explained the constellations actual name to her "ursa major" when i looked south over-head and noticed at first, a solid red-orange light speeding across the sky, at first i thought, "thats a satellite." then upon further observation i realized this object was not only moving waaaaaay to fast to be a satellite, but it was also too large to be a sattelite. there was a commercial airliner in the air at the same time as the object, and i could tell the object was flying a good distance higher than the airplane, and it still yet appeared much bigger, made no sound whatsoever, and was moving about twice as fast. it flew in a straight line path directly southwest and disappeared over the trees. this is one of many things i have seen. if anyone gets the chance, go to washburn, tennessee. it is located in grainger county, tennessee. it registers a 1 on the bortle dark sky scale, which means you can see at least 95% of the night sky and stars contained within that margin. you can see a whole mess of sightings down there.
content.summary: Solid to pulsating orange-red light flying at least mach 2 with no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Intro : i am passionate about everything flying. i have a ultralight airplane licence. i am very capable of making the difference between a commercial airplane strobe, its landing beam, a satellite, a military jet, a meteorite or common stars. what i have seen crossing the sky this day i have never seen it before or since.
i got up early this day and went outside my house to smoke a cigarette. the sky was crystal clear and since there's no big cities around where i live one can appreciate watching stars at night with no artificial light pollution. it happens that i was looking west since the deck outside my house is oriented this way. that's how i've spotted a very bright object (much brighter than the surrounding stars) coming from this direction. there's the greensboro airport not far away from winston salem and sometimes and depending on the wind direction one can spot commercial or private jets making their approach. but they 're easily identifiable since they're flying way under 500 knots with all lights on : landing beam, strobe and green and red wings lights and the noise can not be misled for something else. 
nothing of the sort for the object i have seen. the light emitted was too bright for a landing beam and the speed way above a commercial jet even at cruising speed. 
the altitude was very high in the sky although difficult to estimate in the beginning of my observation. i would say higher than a commercial jet and lower than a satellite
so at first i thought it was a satellite. but i had to change my mind when i saw that the object was pulsating from the higher brightness that made me spot it in the first place to zero light emitted in a cycle of 4 of 5 seconds then returning to high brightness etc. there was clearly a pattern to it and it was not a strobe and usually the satellites reflecting sunlight on their solar panel have a constant brightness. besides it was too big to be a satellite. so in the end of the day i don't know what i've seen that night.
content.summary: Very high altitude fast pulsating object crossed the sky from w to e

content.detailedDescription: I was in our backyard smoking a cigarette and waiting and i noticed a bright light shoot across the sky, very very high up.  it then stopped and hovered over the house next door (still very high).  i watched as it moved up, down, went to the side for about 10 feet, went back up, straight down about 15 feet, hovered again for quite awhile, then shot straight up and out of sight.This is nothing new to us, the only thing new was this was the first one that i have witnessed during the daytime.  i always feel elation and a sense of peace when i see these.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white orb, very high up, moved up and down, side to side then ascended and vanished

content.detailedDescription: I found small like silver and black objects in the windows at my mom's house, maybe (guides) for a laser listening device. i used a like 60 x loop to find them.
content.summary: I found maybe laser sites to guide beams off of windows for nsa/cia in the windows at my mom's house.

content.detailedDescription: First felt that something was looking and analizing my body.Saw large green hazey round craft instantly appear over car for so many seconds than fly straight up and hover about five thousand feet in the air.Sometime after this saw two white discs hover out side my window that zigzag together than stopped. one went one way and the other went the other way.
content.summary: First one hovered over car for about five seconds,two craft hovered over telephone pole.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:30 pm yesterday evening, i was in the task of bringing my dog outdoors to relieve himself.  i glanced into the starlight sky and noticed a strange glowing object:
the object was orange in color, blurry and i could not identify any specific shape, although it could best be described as being an orb.  at first, the object appeared to be stationary, and in a location approximately 45 degrees from the horizontal, and as such, i could not determine its approximate size, other than to estimate that if i were to extend my arm and judge the size by my thumbnail, i would estimate the size from that ratio as being the size of my thumbnail.  the position first appeared to be west and appeared to be stationary, however it could very well be traveling toward me, giving the illusion of being stationary.  my observation of the object in this apparent stationary position was approximately 10 seconds (again, my time of observation���could have been in that position for a greater time duration).    without taking my eyes off this object, i reached for the patio door to open it and instruct my fianc���e to come outside immediately to witness my observation.  at that point in time, we both observed the orb moving slowly southward while descending at approximately a 30-degree angle from the horizontal, stopping briefly, then descending vertically, then becoming out-of-view, obstructed by the neighborhood homes.  this object was absolutely silent; had no trail or tail in its motion; was of constant orange-bright light intensity.  we listened to the 10:00 pm news, expecting to ���catch��� a story, believing that we couldn���t possibly be the only two witnesses of this event.  we both remained calm throughout this experience.  observing that the object was consistent in appearance until our view was blocked by neighborhood homes, we could not determine whether the object landed, impacted, disappeared, or perhaps penetrated the earth.  we expected to see a report on the 10:00 pm news; on-line; morning news...Heard nothing.
content.summary: Appeared to be stationary at my first discovery, then decended to a point, then decended vertically, then obstructed by homes

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were traveling west on tangerine rd. towards twin peaks rd. in marana arizona.  a suburb of tucson.  when the 6 redish-orange lights caught our attention right away.  the first 3 appeared in a line which makes me think of a possible v shape.  than the next 3 appeared next to eachother.  in a matter of 5 seconds they seemed to be spinning upside down, after a half rotation they begun to turn off one by one in the same order they appeared.  i have much interest in ufo's as ive come to find they are very common in tucson.  i have seen things before that have made me wonder what they could be.  this sighting left me with no doubt it was not a man made aircraft of any citizens knowledge.  this is my first report and i can only hope someone else has or will see something of this description.  it gave me chills like ive never had.
content.summary: 2 pars of 3 red glowing objects in a line with eachother, blinking and moving as if they were turning upside down.  saw the first set of 3 they pulsated on, 1 at a time followed by the next 3.

content.detailedDescription: I was drinking coffe with my friend at the lake jarun in zagreb (croatia),i took 3 pictures (left,right and last middle),there was nothing unusual i just wanted to capture the nature,so when i got home and look at the pictures the middle picture had a black spot and i thought i burned my phone lcd display and i panickly zoomed to see if the display was damaged.To my suprise after zooming the object i realised i captchured something wierd.
content.summary: I took  3 pictures of the lake (there was nothing unusual)but when i got home i saw that i captured something strange

content.detailedDescription: It fly hight  more then 15 munite then it become hard to see
content.summary: It fly hight then it become hard to see

content.detailedDescription: Me encontraba en la terraza de mi apartamento en el norte de la ciudad cuando sali a tomar un poco de aire y ver la vista de la ciudad antes de irme a la cama cuando vi sobre el occidente de la ciudad unas luces que bamboleaban en forma pulsada sobre un disco en forma oval abultada es decir la altura de la estructura de la nave era ancha y permaneci������ est������tica durante unos 7 minutos aproximadamente y luego desapareci������. ten������a ventanas en forma oval casi redonda alcanc������ a apreciar unas 4 ventanas y emit������an luces pulsadas de colores blanco, verde, azul y rojo. el color de la luz de la nave era blanco y resplandeciente.
content.summary: Nave en forma de disco abultada estã¡tica con luces girando alrededor

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 10:50pm tuesday june 11, 2013 i witnessed a glowing fire-ball like object in the sky near gratiot and 696.  object was traveling east to west then changed direction and went north. i watched it for about a minute then it shot straight up into the sky, i watched it until i could no longer see it.  what ever this thing was it made no sound and left no trail that i could see.  when i first saw it i thought it was a meteor until it changed direction.
content.summary: Looked like a fire-ball in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were sitting in my backyard, first we played the "crop circle noise" recoding from the cseti et contact tools. next we did about 15 minutes of the dr. steve greer guided field meditation. about 10 minutes after doing the meditation my friend felt the need to look in the exact location of where we saw the ufo. it was a bright white orb that at first looked like it could just be a meteor or satellite but then we both noticed that it changed direction (changed angle as if about to go north east), our first sight of it was at about 85 degrees east and it traveled to about 120 degrees south east. within 2 minutes of seeing that ufo we both looked at about 30 degrees north and saw another ufo of the same size and approximate distance from the ground but this one had a reddish tint with its glowing white. this one traveled to about 105 degrees east before it went out of sight. this ufo weaved up and down while flying. we lost sight of both ufo's due to them either vanishing or moving further out of sight. within a minute of seeing the 2nd ufo a helicopter flew over from the south towards where we first saw the 2nd ufo. spot lights from the ground underneath where we initially saw the 2nd ufo were moving around up into the sky lasting for only a few minutes. 

while i saw the ufo's i was just in awe of what i was seeing. after seeing it i felt a little nervous. 

over the last couple weeks multiple helicopters have flown daily towards the 2nd ufo's starting position.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 ufo's were spotted within minutes of eachother followed by a military helicopter and then search lights.

content.detailedDescription: I had just spent a week hunting with two friends in the high uintas mountains in utah.  on our last day we packed up and where heading home.  we had come up in two suv vehicles so on the way back i was driving alone. we were going to meet up in evanston at a restaurant to eat before the last push to where we lived in utah. my two buddys where in the frist suv and i was following them.  as we reached highway i noticed several deer just eating grass on the side of the highway.  i slowed down to look at the deer amazed that after a week of hunting not seeing any deer worth taking there large groups so close to the road.  i was looking to see if there were any bucks but all i could see was doe's. when i looked up my buddys suv was not in front of me the road was very curvy so i figured he was just out of sight but he could not have been more the 30 seconds ahead of me.  i was pushing it a little trying to catch up to them but it was very dark with no moon up, and the road has not very straight.  most of the time there was nothing on both side of the road but woods.  somewhere near the wyoming border i am not sure exactly which side, i had just came out of a slight right curve my radio went out, followed by my jeep suv beginning to slow down like my truck had just be shut off in neutral.  then from the field to my back right a huge bright light came on like a spot light.  i remember turning to look at the light and then the light fading.  i remember turning around and realizing the suv had stopped rolling and was dead. i remember looking around not seeing any thing but the dark night, then the truck lights slowly came on.  i was confused and scared.  i started the jeep and just wanted to get away.  i remember driving as fast as i could for about another 20 minutes or so to get to evanston.  when i arrived at the restaurant where my friends were already seated and there food was coming out. they told me they had been there for 25-30 minutes and asked me what talk me so long and gave me a hard time for driving so slow.  i told them about the light but when they started giving me a hard time i just dropped it.  this event has stayed with me very clearly over the years, i have told some of my close family and one or two friends.  one friend of mine that i told brought it up in front of other friends to embrace me. so i really have just kept this to myself.  they reason i am reporting this is when i came home today my son was watching a show on tv about a family that had a similar event happen to them and they mentioned they reported it to mufon.  i don't know what happened or think i ever will but i felt i needed to tell my story.
content.summary: Did not see a craft, just a extremely high intensity  bright light

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside with family and friends dew too power outage. lights had came back on at 9:15 pm about 15mins later 9:30 pm my wife said " look up above the house those lights or stars are moving " when looking i seen about 10 to 20 bright lights, with 15 or more dimmer lights following the first 10 to 20 objects. multiple smaller lights following in a staggered formation about 6 following after another in a line formation. could not observe had went behind horizon mountains. felt confused had to ask others " did we really see that? " reply was " yes we did ". wife & children were frighten they had gone back inside the house we still didn't know what we seen that night.
content.summary: Flew from a nw to se ( direction ) in stangered multi-light formation.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north to a retail store on the north end of colorado springs co. taking pictures of the black forest fires. roughly six hours later i was going to post pictures on facebook and noticed a grey alien in my rear view mirror. could be a reflection of anything but it looks too much like an alien. for several nights, my wife and i have been hearing sounds and what seems to be foot steps on our roof at night.
content.summary: Taking pics of fire and found alien in mirror reflection

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Video has been used in commercial airline security and maintenance since 9/11 both inside aircraft and outside the aircraft as well. airlines found it pointless often counterproductive to turn this video footage over to government(s). they are usually destroyed however the most compelling encounters are archived by the airlines for future documentations. airline pilots, maintainer crews and ground crew know the cameras are there but can't tell you what happens to the video. this video isn't even used in court cases as evidence to prove the airlines case against unruly passengers.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.features: None,  Dome,  Window(s),  Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Other,  Unknown

content.shape: Blimp,   Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cone,   Chevron,   Circle,   Cross,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Over 10 years of commercial airline survalance video

content.detailedDescription: Me and my freind were standing out side on my back porch using my telescope. i seen multiple meteor on the night of the sighting. i looked up at the sky to pick a destination to line my telescope to, i then noticed a solid light slowy moving across the sky. when i lookd harder i noticed it had a triangle shape. out the corner of my eye i noticed a similar craft. i then relized there was atleast 4 similar looking objects moving in different directions. i then heard a slight pulseing soud i then noticed a flashing cylinder object fall straight down in the north east horizon. for atleast 30 seconds i heard a pulsating sound then it turned into a vibrating sound.
content.summary: Multiple triangle crafts with lights. eject pulsationg object then vanished

content.detailedDescription: Silent sphere like object with a solid lighted mass revolving/pivoting around the object.Object was bright orange in color or at least had very bright orange light and disappeared into thin air.Very hard to discribe. no sound.Not scary just odd/freaky. spotted it while sitting on the deck in the back yard. ran around the front as it moved through the sky towards the front yard.It had disapperaed by the time i got out there. witnessed by b0th myself and my spouse. a first though it was maybe a police helicopter or plane but no way. was dead silent;never seen revolving lights liek that before.. very odd.
content.summary: Silent sphere like object with a solid mass revolving/pivoting around the object.Object was bright orange in color and disappeared into thin air

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking out the trash.

thought it was a plane then the object became brighter.

a plane at first then realized it wasn't. passed right over me and then i said to myself, i better get this on video. ran into the house.

large ball of white light
didn't seem like plane, no blinking lights that i could notice and no distincive shape
no sound!
moving fast, southwest to east
hard to say the height of the object, but similar to normal height that a plane would be flying, where you can make out all of the details of the plane

video footage taken on iphone.
 

the footage that i have is after it passed over me. at first i thought it was a star and then i noticed movement and it came closer and got bigger. i then thought this has to be a plane, until it got brighter and was making no sound. you can usually hear a plane either as it's passing over or after it has past overhead. this made no sound at all. it was weird. i ran into the house to get my iphone and caught it going away from me.

unreal! 4th sighting in my area since last year!

video sent to mufon contact.
content.summary: Bright white light - circle/orb shape

content.detailedDescription: I was in the parking lot near the corner of illif and chambers in 80014 talking to my friend facing nne and out of the corner of my left eye i saw an object and then looked directly up. it was about the size of 3 quarters side by side. black with swirls/stripes of dark brown. at first for the first few seconds it was a round ballon shape then looked like a butter bean. if you look at the side profile of a bean and it was heading from left to right, the left side/back of it slightly dipped down and picked up speed. i would imagine it was about 40-100 feet above us. we continued to watch it as it flew directly east slowly rising in altitude picking up speed very smoothly. i would guestimate about 15-20 sec later it rose smoothly and fast to a higher elevation. i wondered why and then saw an airplane come into my view traveling from south to north that i assume was landing at denver international airport. in my opinion it rose in elevation to miss the airplane. it was 2 quarters higher than the airplane at the time. the airplane passed behind some trees and the object continued its path into the eastern distance and disappeared into a little pin dot. i felt a surrealness come over me, an awakening once i first saw it slightly tilt back. i believe i saw an object i cannot explain other than as i have wrote here.
content.summary: Black brown bean object heading east over head-went to high elevation for plane landing at dia

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying at my grandparents house for the summer. my grandpa and i were planning a fishing trip the next morning and we were to leave around 4:30. i was restless because the house was hot and i cannot sleep while i am hot. i cracked open the window and set the tv sleep timer on. i stayed awake well after the tv turned off (10 pm). i have always had a habit of sleeping with my head partially underneath the covers and my eyes peaking out for some reason and i think this night explained why. i saw a light come into the room (i was facing the wall underneath the covers at this point still). i slowly rotated trying to not disturb the blankets for fear of what i might see in the room. i had a very uneasy feeling. i started to sweat like crazy and was struck with fear once i turned over. i saw a dark figure standing at my bed side. it had a large head and skinny appendages and thin body. i could not able to move once i saw it. it stood there for a long time watching me. i could not yell or move. i was only 3 feet away from. dare i move and let it know i was awake? i think not. i stayed there calm (still sweating) and scared. i eventually hit the point of exhaustion and passed out. i woke up the next morning tangled in the blankets soaked with sweat and tears.

a year later i decided to bring this up to my mom. before i even finished telling her about the green light, she filled in the rest of the story. she had said the same thing had happened to her when she was about my age. this made me no longer think it was a dream.

i started thinking about the event. i remembered a prior incident. i had a dream i was falling from the sky and landed on my bed. however, i woke from this dream by hitting my bed hard and bouncing off of it. i was confused as can be. it made me start to wondering if anything else has happened before...
content.summary: No ufo but humanoid like entity standing at bed side

content.detailedDescription: Looking off my porch in 2009 or 2010 & saw a glowing green cylinder shaped object which appeared to be moving slowly to the ground.Went back inside for a few minutes & then back out & it was gone.
content.summary: Glowing green cylinder with glowing green flames at the bottom
